name: Lippu - Simple PHP Help Desk (helpdesk)
short_description: A simple web based help desk with no need for a database as all data is stored in XML files. Features include: Job Allocation, Job Progress, Email Notifications, System Tray Notifications of New Jobs, Users can View Job Progress, Simple Statistics.
